name: Jog in Place
description: Let's start easy. We will jog lightly in place. Maintain the pace for 1 min.

name: Star Jumps
description: Now let's do some star jumps. This exercise involves the whole body. We shall jump for 30 seconds.

name: Push ups
description: Now let's build some upper body strength. We shall do this for 1 min.

name: Squats
description: Now let's build some lower body strength. We shall do this for 1 min.
